Description

Ten years have passed since the incidents in Raccoon City and the President of the United States has decided to reveal the truth behind what happened, believing that will limit the rebirth of bioterrorist activity. Beside the President is his personal friend and Raccoon City survivor, Leon S. Kennedy, but when it suffers a bioterrorist attack, Leon is forced to face an unrecognizable president in what will be the most difficult decision of his life. At the same time, the member of the organization BSSA Chris Redfield arrives in China, also under threat of a bioterrorist attack. As no country is safe from these attacks and the ensuing outbreaks, the world population has united under the common fear that there is no hope.

For the first time in the franchise, Resident Evil 6 will be two of the favorite characters from the series as Leon and Chris come together to face this unprecedented threat. They will be joined by new characters, each with their own perspectives and implications in this relentless dramatic horror experience enacted on a global scale.
